arts.ttl: Arsenal star Gabriel Martinelli fumes over 'nasty' tackle that 'could have broke my leg' after Brentford's Christian Norgaard escaped red card in 1-1 stalemate
arts.sum: Gabriel Martinelli has hit out at a 'nasty' tackle from Christian Norgaard that he claims 'could have broke my leg', after the Brentford midfielder escaped a red card during Arsenal's 1-1 draw at the Emirates.

arts.ttl: Thomas Partey injury worry for Arsenal as title hopes hit hard by Brentford draw
arts.sum: Partey scored for the Gunners but had to be withdrawn with 20 minutes remaining.

arts.ttl: Arsenal drop points to Brentford as Liverpool edge closer to title - 5 talking points
arts.sum: ARSENAL 1-1 BRENTFORD: Thomas Partey had given Arsenal the lead just after the hour mark, but Yoane Wissa grabbed Brentford's equaliser with 16 minutes left

arts.ttl: Premier League issue statement as new VAR system intervenes at Arsenal vs Brentford
arts.sum: The Premier League brought in semi-automated offsides this week and the new system made its mark at the Emirates Stadium on Saturday evening during Arsenal's clash with Brentford
